name: cbvexvw
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: 3bitr4i(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1), wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), wn(wal(s1, wn(w1))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wb(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), wn(wal(s1, wn(w1))))
-| wb(wex(s0, w0), wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wb(wex(s1, w1), wn(wal(s1, wn(w1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wb(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), wn(wal(s1, wn(w1))))
-| wb(wex(s0, w0), wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wb(wex(s1, w1), wn(wal(s1, wn(w1))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), wn(wal(s1, wn(w1))))
-| wb(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wal(s1, wn(w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wb(wex(s0, w0), wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wb(wex(s1, w1), wn(wal(s1, wn(w1))))
-| wb(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wal(s1, wn(w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wal(s1, wn(w1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wn(w0), wn(w1)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wb(wex(s0, w0), wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wb(wex(s1, w1), wn(wal(s1, wn(w1))))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wn(w0), wn(w1)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wn(w0), wn(w1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wb(wex(s0, w0), wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wb(wex(s1, w1), wn(wal(s1, wn(w1))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wb(wex(s1, w1), wn(wal(s1, wn(w1))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

comment: Change bound variable. Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes. See ~ cbvexv for a version with fewer disjoint variable conditions but requiring more axioms. (Contributed by NM, 19-Apr-2017.)
